title: Human Connectome — CRN Dynamics
desc: GKSL transport on HCP Subject 100206. T2 basal ganglia gating vs T3 motor relay. Interactive κ sweep, live trajectory animation, 4 diagnostic charts.

title: C. elegans — Touch Withdrawal Circuit
desc: Minimal connectome benchmark. 24 neurons, 41 synapses. κ-sweep, disorder sweep, thermal sensitivity, target sensitivity on synapse-level data.

title: Drosophila Larva — Mushroom Body
desc: CRN transport on the L1 larval mushroom body connectome. PN → KC → MBON pathway with synapse-level resolution.

title: Mouse Cortex Proxy — Synthetic Benchmark
desc: Transport–memory tradeoff on N=8 synthetic graphs (chain, Watts–Strogatz, modular). Evolutionary strategy selection and energy analysis.
